EmailTemplate.description: Email to send attached a paying list of Agents or Carriers after acceptation of costs.
EmailTemplate.name: SCE-EN DATA DISCLOSURE
EmailTemplate.subject: CASS Data Disclosure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Please find attached the requested list, as per your query number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
This file will be charged to your agency through a BTA, to be included in one or your upcoming CASS statements. The corresponding invoice will be available in myIATA (www.myiata.org/ssp).
In case you need further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.com/europe/cs. These queries will be answered with the highest priority.
Yours sincerely,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
